name: FootSkull
description:
The Devil is tired of fighting and wants a change of pace. 
Your speed is your health, headbutt the skull into the goal to score, avoid hitting too many things and never stop moving. Can defeat all teams of dungeon mobs?

WASD to move, mouse to navigate menus, M to mute

Asset pack by 0x72
Music from FreePD
Sound effects from Kenney and Adobe

Linux/Mac versions if requested.
